summary: A Female Stormcloak who also escaped Helgen and currently hiding in The Sleeping Giant Inn in Riverwood. Ready to join your cause~ =)
descriptionHtml:
My First Mod in Skyrim~^^

=UPDATE=
Version 0.3BETA: Fixed missing cosmetic tintmasks.

=Description=
This mods adds a follower in the Sleeping Giant Inn located in Riverwood. She uses 2-handed fighting style and prefers heavy armors.

=Requirements=
Apachii SkyHair: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168
Skyrim patch 1.689 and above (otherwise \'dark face bug\' might occur)

=Recommended=
Univision Face: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14569
Fair skin for CBBE and UNP: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19666
Ultimate Follower Overhaul: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037
Enhanced Character Edit: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12951

=Installation=
Unzip everything in Skyrim/Data Folder.

=Credits=
Apachii for amazing hairstyles~
Hhaleyy for beautiful skin~
Caliente for nice curvy body~
DD AKT for adorable face tints~

=My Other Works=
-Follower- Saber from Fate/Stay Night: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21650
-Follower- Berserker Lancelot from Fate/Zero: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22452
-Follower- Vampire Eileen: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20521
Dark Brotherhood\'s Babette Replacer: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20460


*P/S: If experienced any bugs, please report immediately~ Thank you for your cooperation~! =)
author: ZReincarnation
